mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, B.LROOM_NAME, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A JOIN MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE B ON (A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = B.ROOM_LARGE_NO)
SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.LROOM_NAME FROM MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE A
SELECT A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = #{lNo}
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO=#{dNo} AND STATUS='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE_LIST VALUES (SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{roomSmallNo}, TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{meetingName}, DEFAULT)

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO ATTENDEE_LIST VALUES (SEQ_ATTE.NEXTVAL, #{item.attendeeNo}, SEQ_RESERVE.CURRVAL, DEFAULT)
